title: Blended Management-Technology Integration Training for [Large-Scale] Data Analysis Leaders

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary statistical analysis skills and project management experience
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment combining practical training with virtual reality simulations and online discussion sessions in a BYOD setting, focusing on developing administrators' decision-making skills for solving real-world industrial data problems

learning_goals: Learners can apply data analysis techniques in VR simulations based on real business scenarios and perform decision-making processes with 80% accuracy

Learners achieve over 4 points (on a 5-point scale) in formative assessments for their ability to interpret technical analysis results from a managerial perspective and write reports establishing business strategies
Learners successfully complete multidisciplinary team projects—collaborating with technical analysts to design integrated management-technology solutions—at least three times
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
